product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: B. | EXTERNAL HYDRANT, SPRINKLER LINE & FDA
product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of  Air Compressor with motor,mounted on a common base frame with air receiver tank. The set shall be fitted  with dry suction filter, diaphragm,automatic venting device, safety valve, pressure gauge cooler, motor starter etc. The compressor shall be of capacity 25 M³/Hr( FAD), discharge pressure 10 bar, single stage, reciprocating type
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: mounting: common base frame with air receiver tank, feature: dry suction filter, feature: diaphragm, feature: automatic venting device, feature: safety valve, feature: pressure gauge cooler, feature: motor starter, type: single stage, type: reciprocating

product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, testing and commissioning of GI "C" Class(Heavy Class)  pipes conforming to IS 1239 with threaded or grooved fittings with  including cutting  pipes to correct lengths, providing fittings like elbow,tee,reducer and welding flanges to pipe, fixing with clamps to MS brackets / hangers, steel supports as per drawing.  Rate shall be inclusive of Zinc chromate primer over that 2 coats red enamel paint as per Fire authorities requirement over all above ground pies. Rates to be inclusive of  all complete as per specifications | 50 NB
